title: Sheldon Cooper Presents Fun with Flags
featuredTitle: Sheldon Cooper Presents Fun with Flags
description: Dr. Sheldon Cooper explores the dynamic world of vexillology. Notable guests include Wil Wheaton and LeVar Burton.
quote: Is this a show on flags or mind reading?
altHero: Sheldon Cooper on his couch, gesturing at his whiteboard behind him
alt1: Cooper with Wil Wheaton who is holding a United Federation of Planets flag
alt2: Cooper dressed in lederhosen and Amy Farrah Fowler dressed as a giant pretzel with the flag of Bavaria
alt3: Cooper wearing a Crocodile Dundee hat and holding a boomerang with Fowler dressed as a kangaroo holding the Australia flag
alt4: Fowler approaches Cooper dressed as Betsy Ross sewing the American flag
